Original: Oww... I broke my leg when I slipped
on the ice, so I'm going to be cooling
my heels here for a while.
[Page]
Oh, did you notice when you change the
temperature in the Sacred Mountains,
[Color:5]you can gather different materials[Color:0]?
[Page]
A Sentinel I met during my trip
out there told me. He was a little
strange, but a good guy overall.
Translation: Oww... I broke my leg when I slipped
on the ice, so I'm going to be cooling
my heels here for a while.

Original: Oh, these bandages? I broke some bones
when I slipped on the ice. I'll be
here for a while, I think...
[Page]
Can I ask you something? I took a
request from a [Color:5]Vessel[Color:0] in the [Color:5]Misty
Ravine[Color:0], but I'm laid up here.
[Page]
Could you go in my place? I've been
thinking about making a request about
this...

when I slipped on the ice. I'll be
here for a while, I think...

[Page]

Original: I guess you accepted that request. I
was looking for ice in the [Color:5]Underground
Lake[Color:0], [Color:5]northeast in the Mountains[Color:0].
[Page]
That [Color:5]perpetual shard[Color:0] is probably what
the Vessel is looking for. [Color:5]Go to their
village and give it directly to him[Color:0].
